reviews.review: Plotline has somewhat limited room for exploration, but its intellegence more than makes up for it. Nothing predictable about it and an ending that will stay in your head for weeks after you finish this antebellum-meets-steampunk adventure.

(Completely on PC offline without any DLC)
This is the game that make me to play the final chapter twice in order to understand what really happened. And it will make me want to do a "second wave" to find all the hints the game had given out in the previous chapters and enjoy the storyline again. 

[h1]Pros:[/h1]

Incredible storyline and the ending
Great graphics/art design/details
Excellent soundtrack! Especially “Will The Circle Be Unbroken”
1999 mode (spent Silver Eagle wisely, learned that the hard way)
Lots of weapon choices (might also be a con, because finding the matching ammo was hard…)
Although the main game has little connection with BioShock 1 & 2 (I do not own the season pass), the storyline, soundtrack, and gameplay are the best among the series.

[h1]Cons:[/h1]

It gave us only 1 path to use in the light house chapter, although it felt like open choices. 

Personal rating: 9.5/10

Graphics: Vibrant yet stylish with an almost unique feel to it

Gameplay: I haven't played the first 2 Bioshock games so i can't really tell if there's a big difference.
The action is fluid, combat is fun and the use of different powers or 'Vigors' makes for a experience that's never boring.

Conclusion: a must have for any Bioshock or FPS fan in general
Overal rating: A solid 9/10

Ok, I am not exactly a fan of the BioShock series and honestly did not really expect much from this game. I bought it knowing I could potentially get a refund on it if it did not meet expectations ....

Note the play time I have registered on it thus far - a good chunk of that was in a single day. A. Single. Day.

The story and many of the game play mechanics surprised and impressed me - I have not played many FPS games from the more recent decade that manage to actually have a decent enough story or game play mechanics. Most these days seem to be aimed at the "Shoot first, shoot again, shoot some more and then MAYBE ask questions" crowd. You know the types I am talking about (I would hope). This game? Action/Adventure styled RPG elements mixed into an FPS system and done fairly well (another game in my library does a slightly better job) with gameplay mechanics that show the designers actually tried to balance things out and a story that actually tickles the intellectual part of my mind.

My only complaints thus far deal with a particular part at the end of the main game. Anyone that has played this knows exactly which part I mean ... That is NOT how you design such a thing folks!

All in all though ... a game I have no trouble recommending to friends.
Just amazing! I'm not into shooters but this game caught me and never let me go :D

OYUNLA İLGİLİ SPOİLER İÇERMEKTEDİR FAKAT SPOİLERLAR SİYAH HALDEDİR.
Öncelikle oyunun hikayesine deyineceğim,
Ana karakter ''Booker dewitt'' ve yardımcı karakter ''Elizabeth'' üstünde geçmektedir oyunun hikayesi.
Hikayesi uzun ve zevklidir. Oyun sizi ne hikayeye boğuyor nede savaşmaya. Oyunu oynarken tam hikayeyi oturttum kesin ileride şöyle olucak diyorsunuz ama hiç beklemediğiniz gelişmeler ortaya çıkıyo, oyunun en sevdiğim yanı buda :D

Oynayış yönünü ele alırsak,
Oyun fps(first person shooting) şeklindedir. Oyunda ilerledikçe daha çeşitli silahlar elde edebilirsiniz. Oyunda aynı zamanda ana karakterin kendine özel yetenekleri vardır.[spoiler]Ateş, dondurma yıldırım vs.[/spoiler]

Oyunda 3 adet ek paket bulunmaktadır.
Season pass challenge paketi gibidir. Hikaye yoktur.
Brutal At Sea ise apayrı hikayesi olan 2 adet pakettir. Ek paket olduğuna aldanmayın aynı ana hikaye gibi mükemmel bir sürükleyiciliği var.[spoiler]Hikaye tamamen denizin altında geçmektedir.Daha güçlü yaratıklar vardır ve oyun size Elizabeth ile oynama imkanı vermektedir.[/spoiler]
Eğer yararlı bulduysan beğenip diğer insanlarada ulaşmasını sağlayabilirsin. :)

Esta bien, pero tiene una pega...que existe Bioshock 1 y 2.
Rapture es más inquietante y misterioso que una ciudad en el aire. Pero es cuestión de gustos...yo soy como Sebastian, prefiero baaaajo el mar.

[u]This review does not take in consideration the Bioshock series as a whole, as I have yet to play the earlier games.[/u]
[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Looks pretty good, decent textures and nice vfx
[*]Story and setting is interesting
[*]Acceptable performance on an i5-4690k & gtx 950
[/list]
Bonus:
[list]
[*]Good linux port (sans DX11 features)
[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Short. No replay value other than achievements
[*]Combat is flat, quickly becomes tedious.
[*]Generic enemies rush the player. Boss fights are few and underwhelming
[*]Story may not have as much depth for non-americans
[*]Infrequent, but present, framedrops [spoiler]more noticable on linux[/spoiler]
[*]Poor AI. Enemies and Elizabeth get stuck more than once.
[*]No manual saving, reliance on autosave only
[/list]

Other:
[list]
[*]No Intel/mesa driver support, as listed in System Requirements
[/list]

[h1]In conclusion:[/h1]
The game looks and feels good in the beginning, but becomes a chore to complete due to boring combat and mostly forgettable generic enemies.
Environments like dull corridors and hallways filled with enemies interrupt the story centric gameplay like a cheap on-rails shooter.
The story is the highlight of the game but probably doesn't offer much depth for non-americans. I enjoyed the storytelling, though some may find it to be a bit "2deep4u" or preachy.

Verdict:
[b]This game is not recommended at full price[/b]
классный сюжет, графон отменный игра нереально крутая

Про серию BioShock я знал ничтожно мало, просто непростительно мало. Решил приобрести данный шедевр на расспродаже вместе со всеми другими частями серии, просто, как дополнительнные 3 игры в библиотеку, боже, прости меня глупого ! Эта игра потрясла мой придел психики, она заставляет смеятся, напрягаться, рыдать... 

Но вскоре вы понимаете, что это всё простая ширма. На самом деле в прекрасном городе царит тоталитарность и буржуазизм. Богатые доминируют над бедными, угнетают и без зазрения совести убивают их. В каких то районах царит настоящая война. А в это время, государь Коллумбии - Пророк - говорит о светлом будущем и призывает всех жителей найти и уничтожить вас. Вам ничего не остаётся, кроме как прокладывать себе дорогу многочисленными трупами и кровавыми лужами, попутно удивляясь "тёмной" стороне Колумбии. 

Но вы не один. С вами бегает странноватая, но невероятно красивая и умная девушка Элизабет. Сначала она словно маленький ребёнок радует всему, что окружает вас и с оптимизмом смотрит на будущее, но судьба города меняет её. Меняет в тёмную сторону. Эта перемена в буквальном смысле поражает вас и вы не можете поверить, что ранее милая девушка может стать таким же, как и вы - убийцей. 

А между тем, события принимают иной оборот. В какой то момент вы словно оказываетесь в другом мире, в другой реальности, где всё протекает иначе, но и там есть опасность. А в конце вы засомневаетесь - а в настоящей ли вселенной вы? Что есть правда, а что есть ложь? Кто вы такой на самом деле, и кто такая Элизабет? Последние минуты игры в буквальном смысле рвут все мыслимые и немыслимые шаблоны.Это необычная игра. Под динамичным экшеном скрывается нечто большее, что есть на самом деле. И это нечто должно поразить вас и не оставить равнодушным. Это уникальное явление в жанре боевик.
Это необычная игра. Под динамичным экшеном скрывается нечто большее, что есть на самом деле. И это нечто должно поразить вас и не оставить равнодушным. Это уникальное явление в жанре боевик.

Jogue o jogo.

-gameplay molto "call of duty" completamente slegato del primo e dal secondo capitolo
-personaggi secondari quasi assenti ed inutili togliendo i gemelli lutece
-narrativa  e poco profonda dovuta al fatto che le registrazioni o audio diari sono ridicole rispetto a quelle dei capitoli precedenti e le cabine con i filmati sono noiosissime
-dal punto di vista tecnico è un gioco un po' fragile (basti pensare ai corvi)
-graficamente non male, le armi sono fatte benissimo e le luci sono davvero suggestive in alcuni punti

SPOILER
-l'idea di fondo della trama è molto buona, ma quando arravano infiniti mondi paralleli che comunicano tra loro a seconda di come volevano manipolare la trama e paradossi inspiegabili sembra diventare un film di christopher nolan (ovviamente ha anche moltissimi buchi di trama)

Итак, с момента выхода Bioshok Infinite прошло 3 года, а это значит, что самое время написать обзор.
 Сюжет. Игра рассказывает на историю американского сыщика Букера Девитта. Главный герой весь в долгах. Однако ему предлагают сделку: Он приводит им девушку по имени Элизабет, а они прощают долг. Вариантов у главного героя немного, и по этому, он соглашается. Сюжет у игры настолько хорош, что описывать дальнейшие события я не буду, оставляя это на радость самостоятельного изучения.
 Графика и художественное оформление. Стиль у Infinite просто шикарный, художники постарались на славу, а картинка радует глаз даже на средних настройках. Музыка тоже на высоте, за это спасибо Гарри Шайману, который написал замечательный саундтрек. Всё это создаёт неповторимую атмосферу, за которую, лично я и полюбил эту игру.
 Геймплей. Игровой процесс, пожалуй, самая слабая часть Infinite: стрелять просто не интересно, а спец. способности призванные разнообразить игровой процесс, со своей задачей справляются слабо…
 Вот так и получается, что в шутере от первого лица, хорошо всё, кроме перестрелок. И, тем не менее, я посоветую вам эту игру. Ради сюжета, ради стиля, ради атмосферы. Моя оценка 8 из 10, ни больше, ни меньше…
Úžasná hra s úžasnou grafikou a příběhem! Můžu jen doporučit...

In a world obsessed with Open World, Bioshock dares to write a tightly scripted story. They pull it off by 
 - delivering stunning visuals consistantly.
 - Having mountains of content in each scene (ie: all npc's have unique monologue, secret rooms)
 - Providing clear direction for where to go next (d-pad up)
 - Making combat wicked fun. 
Towards the end, the story drags out for 30 minutes longer than needed, 
but they had genuine emotional content that needed closure.

9/10 wiggles

最后还是一拖再拖的把DLC给打完了，简单来说就是一句话，这个游戏真的是一个艺术品。其实很久以前就在xbox上面打爆了，但是最后还是忍不住买了一份，因为听说这个系列再也不会出了。为什么？太话费人力物力，但是收益并不好。还记得第一次上到哥伦比亚的时候，打开门的那一瞬间。看着外面的风景，这是我第一个在原地站了5分钟的游戏，这真的已经不是游戏了，这已经是一个艺术品了。希望以后还可以看见这个工作室的作品，你们不是程序员，你们是艺术家

เกมนี้ทำให้เรื่องเล่าทั้งปวง กลายเป็นนิทานเด็กเล่น

ข้อดี
-เนื้อเรื่องครับ  ไม่มีอะไรต้องอธิบายมาก ถ้าชาตินี้ไม่ได้เล่น พลาด แล้วละ
-กราฟฟิก สวยงามดีครับ งานศิลป์ ดีมาก-ดีที่สุด เกมหนึ่ง 
-เกมเพลย สนุก มันส์ บางครั้งก็น่ากลัว ครบทุกรสชาติ ระบบ vigors ดีมากๆ
-เล่นแล้วไม่อยากลุกไปไหนเลย ถ้าเป็นไปได้อยากเล่นรวดเดียว 12 ชม.จนจบเลยละ 55

ข้อเสีย
-เกมสั้นไปหน่อย แต่ก็ดีแล้ว ไม่งั้นเนื้อเรื่องคงไม่ลงตัวแบบนี้
-มี stop working ด้วย มันทำให้ผมต้อง reinstall เกมไป 1 ครั้ง เสียเวลาสุดๆ

The only problem with this game is the combat that gets a bit repetitive. One of the best stories I've ever played and the visuals are stunning. Just like Rapture, Columbia has its own, incredibly well created atmosphere that is hard to find in any other game.

这款游戏真的是太棒了，前期美丽的悬空城抓住了我的眼球，然而好景不长，布克很快就成了一个被人追杀的可怜娃，然后我最喜欢的伊丽莎白出现了，太喜欢她了，当我濒临死亡的时候她给我送来生命值，当我没有子弹的时候，给我送来了子弹，当我没有办法打开大门的时候，是她帮助了我，完成了一个又一个任务，也是她一直陪伴着我，持续了一场一场的战斗，我爱她，精神或是身体，恩，就是这样看到海葬dlc里我的女神死了，当然的晚餐都没有去吃，大爱这个设定。说剧情，我实在是没有看懂太多，到后面就是各种乱来，可能是一代和二代没有玩吧，也不打算补坑，因为我女神都死了，我打着还有什么意思，（怒！最后说一下画面，前期浪漫画风，后期那种阴暗的画面扑面而来，两种一对比，真是觉得美丽的背后都有肮脏的PY交易，咦，这是我猜的，评测建立在 i5 4210m gtx960M上，总分9.7/10
Ну что тут сказать ... Буду краток 10 из 10.
Just a BLAST!
AMAZING GAME , I bought this game in 2016 ! and even it's been old it steel amazing   gameplay, story and graphic !

[h1] A rare, beautiful, exciting and one of Gamings Shining Moments[/h1]

Quite simply the best single player story driven game ever made in my opinion. It wasnt until I found myself lacking a great single player experience to be had in the past year or so that I decided to repurchase Bioshock Infinite on Steam and see how it held up. It held up great, but even moreso the gameplay, story, and experience still outshines its peers.

[h1]Here is just a few things that make this game so great[/h1]

     It has an absolutely brilliant story! I cant say enough about how cohesive, thought out, and realized this story is. The thing that sticks out the most to me is that this game has some absolutely insane huge twists, yet your too wrapped up in the whats happening now with your character and Elizabeth that you never see it coming.

Gameplay that is unrivaled. Its a first person shooter that executes well, it does this because it doesnt try to be something its not, and knows what type of experience they want you to have. You have one arm that is designated for weapons (Brutally easy to swap) and the other hand is for your vigors (powers)  that you pick up along the way. Using both of these together and often is so seamless. 

The game has light RPG elements only in the sense that you have to choose what weapons and vigors (powers) to upgrade with your hard earned coins you pick up. That suits this style of game lovely, as you dont stay away from the story very long flopping through in menu screens.

Graphics are still really polished and do no injustice to this game what so ever. The whole art style is fantastic. It plays out like a city built in the sky to resemble Heaven and Americana Circa 1940s. The music is beautiful, and accompanies it well.

The game genre I guess would be Science Fiction FPS/Adventure. The thing that makes it so hard to put this game into this category is that there are some genuinely spooky moments, some genuinely Tony Hawk and now Sunset Overdrive style gameplay flying around on Rails, and genuinely just an amazing adventure game.The Rapture DLC is a real treat for all of those who missed being in Rapture, the story is quite awesome as well. Highly Recomend it.

Ok I know Im gushing here, but this game ladies and gents, is quite frankly a very rare gem. It should be had by all. I think of it as the Shawshank Redemption, Michael Jordan Game Six, Eminem the Marshall Mathers LP of video games. 

** Note this is my second purchase of this game, and fourth to fifth playthrough.
